name: segment16
description:
Spinning through the dataverse, dodging virii and tearing them apart with concentrated bursts of garbage data.

This is a game about shooting things that are out to get you. Arrow keys or WASD to move. Either CTRL key to fire. You'll rotate 90 degrees at the end of each round ("rnd"), so keep your eyes peeled.
Start in the script-kiddie Segment ("seg"), number 0, and work your way up. Beware; more advanced Segments have had their ports scrambled. Don't get too used to the pattern. If you need a break, hit P to pause. Hit P again to unpause.

Shooting malware adds to your HP ("hp+"). If you get hit by a virus, you'll lose a chunk of HP. Run out, and you'll be disconnected. Hit R to reconnect.

This game is in extremely early development. I'll be working hard on it whenever I can. You don't have to pay for it, but I'd appreciate it if you'd tip me some lunch money.

Listen for updates at https://telegram.me/segment16
